Despite the blandishments of the real estate con artist, the intended mark remained __________ about the value of the plot for sale, as, on the map, it seemed to border a swamp.
A.	optimistic
B.	enthused
C.	irascible
D.	skeptical
E.	jaundiced
F.	leery
